cards.title: Giant Rat
cards.description: A large, aggressive rodent found in dark places.

cards.title: Zombie
cards.description: A slow-moving, undead creature with a hunger for flesh.

cards.title: Bandit
cards.description: A rogue outlaw, skilled with a blade and cunning tactics.

cards.title: Troll
cards.description: A massive creature with regenerative abilities.

cards.title: Wraith
cards.description: A ghostly entity that drains the life from its victims.
cards.quote: Feel the chill of the grave.

cards.title: Minotaur
cards.description: A powerful beast-man with a deadly axe.

cards.title: Chimera
cards.description: A monstrous creature with the heads of a lion, goat, and snake.

cards.title: Wyvern
cards.description: A winged serpent-like dragon, fierce and venomous.
cards.quote: My venom will be your end.
